## Copy and paste to /Users/[username]/.gitignore_global

    # Compiled source #
    ###################
    *.com
    *.class
    *.dll
    *.exe
    *.o
    *.so

    # Packages #
    ############
    *.7z
    *.dmg
    *.gz
    *.iso
    *.jar
    *.rar
    *.tar
    *.zip

    # Logs #
    ########
    *.diff
    *.err
    *.orig
    *.log
    *.rej
    *.swo
    *.swp
    *.vi
    *~
    *.sass-cache

    # Erros #
    #########
    /error_log

    # OS generated files #
    ######################
    .DS_Store
    .DS_Store?
    ._*
    .Spotlight-V100
    .Trashes
    Icon?
    ehthumbs.db
    Thumbs.db

    # Editor Project #
    ##################
    *.sublime-project
    *.sublime-workspace
    *.idea

    # Dreamweaver added files #
    ###########################
    _notes
    dwsync.xml
